entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:15 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 7:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
